response.original_title: Notorious B.I.G. Bigga Than Life Unauthorized
response.overview: On the real, Bigga Than Life chronicles the life and shocking death of Notorious B.I.G. Known as "Biggie Smalls" to his friends and massive fan base, Biggie quickly became the "King of Rap" by the mid-'90s.  Biggie Smalls' record sales have well exceeded 10 million copies. Even though he is gone, his music will live on for years to come.  *Exclusive never-before-released Biggie Smalls interview *Ice T interview *Exclusive first-time-ever released rap tribute *Program recorded in Stereo  This program is not rated and contains explicit and unedited language and/or visual material which may be offensive to some viewers. Parental discretion is advised.  This program is not endorsed or authorized by the family or estate of Notorious B.I.G. or any representatives therefor.  Distributed by Beast Video
response.title: Notorious B.I.G. Bigga Than Life Unauthorized
